description:
Yuzuka talks to her mom about being a magical girl. She has an interesting take on the whole thing, when someone else shows up...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jaa, Nan no Tame no Mahou Shoujo na no?
Je suis la maman d’une magical girl !
Then, Why There are Magical Girls?
じゃあ, 何の為の魔法少女なの?
